References

   
Module MovieRenderPipelineRenderPasses
Header /Engine/Plugins/MovieScene/MovieRenderPipeline/Source/MovieRenderPipelineRenderPasses/Public/Graph/Nodes/MovieGraphPathTracerPassNode.h
Include #include "Graph/Nodes/MovieGraphPathTracerPassNode.h"

Syntax

UCLASS ()  
class UMovieGraphPathTracerRenderPassNode : public UMovieGraphImagePassBaseNode

Remarks

A render node which uses the path tracer.

Variables

  Type Name Description
TArray< FMoviePipelinePostProcessPass > AdditionalPostProcessMaterials An array of additional post-processing materials to run after the frame is rendered.
bool bAllowOCIO Allow the output file OpenColorIO transform to be used on this render.
bool bDisableToneCurve If true, the tone curve will be disabled for this render pass.
bool bEnableDenoiser If true the resulting image will be denoised at the end of each set of Spatial Samples.
bool bEnableReferenceMotionBlur When enabled, the path tracer will blend all spatial and temporal samples prior to the denoising and will disable post-processed motion blur.
bool bLightingComponents_IncludeDiffuse Whether the render should include diffuse lighting contributions.
bool bLightingComponents_IncludeEmissive Whether the render should include directly visible emissive components.
bool bLightingComponents_IncludeIndirectDiffuse Whether the render should include indirect diffuse lighting contributions.
bool bLightingComponents_IncludeIndirectSpecular Whether the render should include indirect specular lighting contributions.
bool bLightingComponents_IncludeIndirectVolume Whether the render should include indirect volume lighting contributions.
bool bLightingComponents_IncludeSpecular Whether the render should include specular lighting contributions.
bool bLightingComponents_IncludeVolume Whether the render should include volume lighting contributions.
uint8: 1 bOverride_AdditionalPostProcessMaterials  
uint8: 1 bOverride_bAllowOCIO  
uint8: 1 bOverride_bDisableToneCurve  
uint8: 1 bOverride_bEnableDenoiser  
uint8: 1 bOverride_bEnableReferenceMotionBlur  
uint8: 1 bOverride_bLightingComponents_IncludeDiffuse  
uint8: 1 bOverride_bLightingComponents_IncludeEmissive  
uint8: 1 bOverride_bLightingComponents_IncludeIndirectDiffuse  
uint8: 1 bOverride_bLightingComponents_IncludeIndirectSpecular  
uint8: 1 bOverride_bLightingComponents_IncludeIndirectVolume  
uint8: 1 bOverride_bLightingComponents_IncludeSpecular  
uint8: 1 bOverride_bLightingComponents_IncludeVolume  
uint8: 1 bOverride_bWriteAllSamples  
uint8: 1 bOverride_DenoiserType  
uint8: 1 bOverride_FrameCount  
uint8: 1 bOverride_SpatialSampleCount  
bool bWriteAllSamples Debug Feature.
EMovieGraphPathTracerDenoiserType DenoiserType Select which type of denoiser to use when the denoiser is enabled.
int32 FrameCount The number of frames to consider when using temporal-based denoisers.
int32 SpatialSampleCount How many sub-pixel jitter renders should we do per temporal sample? This can be used to achieve high sample counts without Temporal Sub-Sampling (allowing high sample counts without motion blur being enabled), but we generally recommend using Temporal Sub-Samples when possible.
